item.description:
The Effect of the TseTse Fly on African Development

Economic History Workshop
Date: September 14, 2012
Time: 2:00 pm - 3:30 pm
Location: M-16 Littauer Center (North Yard)
This is open to the public.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Moderator/Chair; Dell, Melissa, PhD candidate in economics, Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Goldin, Claudia: Henry Lee Professor of Economics, Harvard University.

Hornbeck, Richard: Faculty Associate. Assistant Professor, Department of Economics, Harvard University.

Nunn, Nathan: Faculty Associate. Professor, Department of Economics, Harvard University.

Robinson, James A.: Executive Committee; Steering Committee; Faculty Associate; Harvard Academy Senior Scholar.

David Florence:Â Professor of Government, Department of Government, Harvard University.

Speaker: Alsan, Marcella, PhD in Economics, Harvard University.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
item.name: Tse Tse
